resources.string: Tribune Zamaneh
Tribune Zamaneh is a secure news reader and reporter app featuring group conversations around news.
Comments
The stories shared with you using Tribune Zamaneh Nearby are listed here.
About Tribune Zamaneh
Go Online with Tor

Tor is an open network that helps keep you safe online. It defends against network surveillance that threatens your personal freedom and privacy. You will use the Orbot app to connect to the Tor network.
Tap the panic button to delete your personal data within Tribune Zamaneh. You can set the panic action to delete the entire app in your settings.
Share stories, feeds and the entire app using Tribune Zamaneh Nearby. It\'s safe, easy and only requires a friend nearby with Bluetooth. App sharing requires a WiFi network or hotspot.
Talk About the News
Chat with the Tribune Zamaneh community using Tribune Zamaneh Talk.

Tips to reduce your data consumption:

1. Sync only the feeds that matter to you most. Tribune Zamaneh allows you to sync individual feeds.

2. Choose Bit Wise syncing mode in your settings. This syncs only text, with the ability to load photos on a story by story basis.

3. Expire your articles in a timely manner. Choose your time frame in your settings.
Terms and Software Licenses
Terms and Software Licenses

User-Submitted Materials

BBG Websites may allow users to post, upload, transmit, or otherwise submit comments, messages, photos, images, story ideas, or other content or materials (collectively “User-Submitted Materials). You acknowledge that User-Submitted Materials may be routed through our servers, the servers of one or more third parties on our behalf, and the Internet. You acknowledge that BBG Websites are for public and not private communications.

You may only submit materials to BBG Websites for which you have the copyright or other necessary rights and permission to distribute electronically. You may not violate, plagiarize, or infringe on the rights of third parties, including copyright, patent, trademark, trade secret, privacy, personal, publicity, moral or proprietary rights. You agree and represent that you own or have all necessary rights and permissions to use, distribute, and authorize BBG to use and distribute any materials you submit.

You retain any copyright or other ownership rights you possess in any User-Submitted Materials that you submit on or through BBG Websites. However, by submitting any User-Submitted Materials on or through BBG Websites, you hereby grant BBG a non-exclusive, perpetual, royalty-free, fully paid up, worldwide, transferable license to use, copy, sublicense, modify, transmit, publicly perform, display, create derivative works of, host, index, cache, tag, encode, and/or adapt your User-Submitted Materials in any and all media formats or channels, whether now known or hereafter devised.

Additional user-submitted material Rules Specific to Posting Comments

BBG will make every effort to review and post comments within 48 hours, although BBG is under no obligation to post comments within any deadline or to post the comments at all. BBG encourages thoughtful discussion and will not censor comments based on ideology or political points of view. BBG will not edit comments - we will either post them or refuse to post them. All comments must follow these rules:

- Stay on topic.
- No obscenity, profanity, vulgarity, hate language, SHOUTING, or other bad behavior.
- No personal attacks. No inflammatory language or calls for violence.
- No advocating or providing instruction on how to conduct any illegal activity
- No advertising, promotional materials, "junk mail," "spam," "chain letters," "pyramid schemes," or any other form of solicitation
- Simple text only, no html or other code.

Share the news that’s happening around you

Tribune Zamaneh provides a feed of noteworthy news to its community. Every post created with Tribune Zamaneh will undergo a curation process before it is shared in the official Tribune Zamaneh news feed. Please see the Terms & Conditions ("About Tribune Zamaneh" then "Terms & Software Licenses) to understand the rights you grant when you share information with Tribune Zamaneh.
To share the Tribune Zamaneh app or the apps supported by it (Orbot and ChatSecure) with people nearby, please take the following steps:
Your friend must have the Tribune Zamaneh app open to the \'Receive a Share\' screen from the side menu.
Receive a story from a friend using Tribune Zamaneh Nearby.
Create your Tribune Zamaneh Nickname
